data.name: NoInternetMessage
data.value: Your Internet connection appears to be offline. Check your network settings and try again.
data.comment: Message to display when an something fails because of lack of internet

data.name: ServerErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred when communicating with the server.
data.comment: Message to display when an something fails due to server communications

data.name: UnableToGetTokenErrorMessage
data.comment: Message to display if we cannot get the access tokens

data.name: UnableToAuthenticateErrorMessage
data.comment: Message to display if we cannot authenticate when using authorization code oAuth strategy
